description:
A game in the classic and familiar Beat Them Up genre, in tribute to history, everything in the game is done according to the old traditions of beat em up games, but with nicer graphics and more convenient controls. Feel yourself in the shoes of a street fighter whom everyone wants to beat, but he does not able to give up.
Game Features:
- styling and caric graphics
- many levels
- boss battles
- cool combat system
- different locations
Dare to become a thunderstorm of the streets and prove to your enemies that you should not be contacted.
name: Beat Them Up - Street Fight Band Simulator
